scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run copy-pkg && tsc
scripts.watch: npm run clean; npm run copy-pkg && tsc -w
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run make-zip && npm run sign-zip
scripts.make-zip: mkdir ./release/; export VERSION=$(cat package.json | jq -r '.version') && zip -j release/nearly-headless-nick_$VERSION.zip build/*
scripts.sign-zip: export VERSION=$(cat package.json | jq -r '.version') && keybase pgp sign -d -i release/nearly-headless-nick_$VERSION.zip -o release/nearly-headless-nick_$VERSION.zip.asc
scripts.build-docker-image: npm run build && export VERSION=$(cat package.json | jq -r '.version') && sudo docker build . -t nearly-headless-nick:$VERSION
